definition: Dandong prefecture-level city in Liaoning province 遼寧省|辽宁省 in northeast China
red/pellet/powder/cinnabar
surname Dong
east/host (i.e. sitting on east side of guest)/landlord
Dandong prefecture-level city in Liaoning province 遼寧省|辽宁省 in northeast China

sentences.english: A visit to the King of Medicine Temple in Dandong might cure you of all illnesses.
sentences.chinese: 到丹东的药王庙一游，可以治好一切疾病。

sentences.english: The Dasha River is the mother river of Dandong.
sentences.chinese: 大沙河是丹东的母亲河。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, the outskirts of Dandong are home to the easternmost section of the Great Wall of China.
sentences.chinese: 丹东市郊还是中国长城东段的源头。
那是因为在丹东港的时候。

sentences.english: For the sans-culottes of Paris, he was the embodiment of the revolution.
sentences.chinese: 在巴黎“无套裤汉”眼中，丹东就是革命的象征。

sentences.english: In this paper, the people of 60 years or older is for the survey.
sentences.chinese: 本文以丹东市城区60岁以上的老年人为调查对象。

sentences.english: He is Napoleon's stay and Danton 's resource.
sentences.chinese: 他是拿破仑的支柱，丹东的后盾。

sentences.english: Those sentiments are felt on Dandong's waterfront as well as in Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 不止在北京，在丹东的江畔这种看法也感受得到。

sentences.english: But his passions had a macabre side.
sentences.chinese: 但丹东的激情也有恐怖的一面。

sentences.english: It is said every visitor to Dandong, would come to the Broken Bridge for a look.
sentences.chinese: 听说几乎每一个来丹东的人都会到断桥来看一看。

sentences.english: This lady hears the news, specially came to Dandong to put his son back.
sentences.chinese: 庄夫人闻讯，特意来到丹东要把儿子抓回去。

sentences.english: The city of Dandong in China borders North Korea, with the Yalu River in between.
sentences.chinese: 中国的丹东和朝鲜毗邻。
